p: Considering how the therapeutic importance of Lamiaceae species is mostly based on their volatile oils [ 41], here essential oil constituents of Lamium plants are described. Even though plants belonging to the Lamiaceae family are recognized to contain an eminent amount of essential oils, the plants from the genus Lamium of the subfamily Lamioideae possess a small number of essential oils. The yields of the essential oils extracted from the fresh flowers of Lamium plants differ between 0.01â€“0.31% [ 42].
